sentences.en: Aftermarket oil additives are not recommended for use with AMSOIL motorcycle oil.
sentences.cn: 售后石油添加剂建议不要与AMSOIL摩托车油的使用.

sentences.en: Aftermarket whole series of varieties, good quality, all export products, export packaging.
sentences.cn: 汽车精品系列品种全, 质量好, 均为出口产品, 出口包装.

sentences.en: Cons: As with all other bundled headphone, I strongly suggest you get an aftermarket one.
sentences.cn: 缺点: 象其它标配的耳机一样(质量一般), 我强烈建议你重配其它更好的耳机.

sentences.en: External communicating with US, SC, sales team, WGQ, ITS aftermarket, 800, etc.
sentences.cn: 对外与US.SC销售团队, 外高桥, ITS售后, 800等业务部门联系.

sentences.en: Is committed to providing customers with professional, efficient Aftermarket products and tools for protection.
sentences.cn: 致力为客户提供专业 、 快捷的工具产品及售后保障.

sentences.en: It's illegal to get into a formal agreement with investors that they'll buy in the aftermarket.
sentences.cn: 与投资者达成正式协议、允许他们在后市上买入的做法是非法的。

sentences.en: Its products span the full life cycle of production processes, from new lines to aftermarket services.
sentences.cn: 公司为客户提供新生产线,项目改造,工艺优化升级等业务.

sentences.en: Responsible for advertising, with single - customer service, computer assembly, maintenance and other aftermarket business.
sentences.cn: 负责为广告宣传, 客服配单, 组装电脑, 售后维修等业务.

sentences.en: Take in charge of analysis and resolving of these parts'test incident, assembling and aftermarket problems.
sentences.cn: 负责这些零件的试验故障 、 装车问题、售后抱怨等问题的分析和跟踪解决.

sentences.en: The company serves light vehicle, commercial truck, trailer and specialty original equipment manufacturers and certain aftermarket.
sentences.cn: 公司服务于轻型车辆 、 商用卡车 、 拖车和特种车辆及部分售后市场.

sentences.en: The company serves the national automotive aftermarket with a broad range of accessory and recreational-vehicle products.
sentences.cn: 该公司为全国汽车零配件市场提供各种零配件和休闲旅游车产品。

sentences.en: We are a distributor of high quality new parts to both OE and Aftermarket customers.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家分销商的高品质的新零件都OE和售后的客户.

words.tran_cn: 零件市场；二级市场（等于secondary market）

trans.tran_cn: （汽车等）零部件市场，<经>二级市场，售后市场，<金><美>（原始股上市后的）股票市场
trans.tran_en: The aftermarket is all the related products that are sold after an item, especially a car, has been bought
